item.title: 一位中国牧师发现，即使出狱后，他也不能完全自由，他买不到火车票，甚至不能去医院看医生。
item.description:
Unable to buy a train ticket, or even see a doctor at a hospital, a Chinese pastor found that even after his release from prison, he is not quite free. https://t.co/uHxDJDwzuY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 白宫周日抨击国会共和党人在政府拨款法案中加入一项条款，该条款实质上阻止了美国大使馆上空悬挂 LGBTQ+ 自豪旗帜，并誓言要废除该条款。
item.description:
The White House on Sunday slammed Congressional Republicans for including a provision in the government funding bill that essentially stops LGBTQ+ Pride flags from being flown over U.S. embassies and vowed to repeal it.https://t.co/HuYO4HHPqs pic.twitter.com/vdlVDawv7S

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 快餐连锁店 Chick-Fil-A背弃了其十年前做出的 "绝不使用抗生素 "的承诺，该承诺旨在帮助防止人类因畜牧生产中大量使用抗生素而产生抗药性。
item.description:
The fast-food chain Chick-Fil-A backtracked from its decade-old “no antibiotics ever” pledge intended to help prevent human antibiotic resistance linked to the rampant use of the drugs in livestock production.https://t.co/h6QAjiMjJB pic.twitter.com/9l9BicXVAs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在堪萨斯州加登城的 83 号公路上，强风暴席卷了整个地区，狂风卷着碎石飞向迎面而来的车辆。
item.description:
Intense winds sent debris flying toward oncoming traffic on Highway 83 in Garden City, Kansas, as severe storms moved through the region. pic.twitter.com/kdJnunm2Ur

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 五角大楼确认在红海失踪后死亡的水手身份。
item.description:
Pentagon identifies sailor who died after going missing in Red Sea. https://t.co/Vl1sSCwv6V

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）不愿透露为什么拜登的竞选团队不顾安全问题在 TikTok 上进行宣传。
item.description:
Vice Pres. Kamala Harris won't say why Biden campaign is on TikTok despite security concerns. https://t.co/W7tLOofLGh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 无论是亲戚还是朋友，美联航现在都允许其前程万里（MileagePlus）会员使用一项新功能，在一个联名账户中最多可有五人贡献和合并里程。
item.description:
Whether it's relatives or friends, United now allows its MileagePlus members to access a new feature to contribute and combine miles into one joint account with up to five people. https://t.co/orKU6Qwbsx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 太空天气预报员发布了将持续到下周一的地磁暴警报，称太阳耀斑喷发出的等离子体可能会干扰地球上的无线电传输。不过，这也可能成为观赏极光的绝佳机会。
item.description:
Space weather forecasters have issued a geomagnetic storm watch through Monday, saying an ouburst of plasma from a solar flare could interfere with radio transmissions on Earth. It could also make for great aurora viewing.https://t.co/KSzN9nvyd7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 新的 "单身汉欢乐时光 "播客即将上线，它将邀请两位深受粉丝喜爱的 "黄金单身汉 "女主播。
item.description:
A new "Bachelor Happy Hour" podcast is on its way and it will feature two fan favorite women from "The Golden Bachelor." https://t.co/bIboz0Gijo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: "这就提出了人与人之间关系的根本问题"。
item.description:
"This brings up fundamental questions of what it means to have human relationships." https://t.co/MLhP8F0pyx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据加利福尼亚州当局称，两兄弟周末在森林中郊游时遭遇了山狮袭击，结果导致其中一人死亡，另一人面部受伤。
item.description:
A weekend outing in the woods took a horrific turn for two brothers when a mountain lion attacked them, killing one and leaving the other with traumatic injuries to the face, according to authorities in California. https://t.co/L12WvBaD8p

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据佐治亚州调查局称，本周早些时候，两名少年在从法庭案件押送至佐治亚州奥古斯塔市青少年拘留中心的途中从警方手中逃脱，他们被指控犯有严重伤害罪。
item.description:
Two teenagers who escaped from police while being transported from a court case to a youth detention center in Augusta, Georgia, earlier this week have been charged with aggravated assault, according to the Georgia Bureau of Investigation.https://t.co/M0lhIAt1OZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 当 @rachelvscott 问及如果以色列不顾反对按计划入侵拉法追捕哈马斯战士，"美国是否会承担后果 "时，副总统哈里斯说："我不排除任何可能性。
item.description:
When pressed by @rachelvscott on whether there will be “consequences from the United States” if Israel moves forward with a planned invasion of Rafah in pursuit of Hamas fighters despite opposition, Vice Pres. Harris says, “I am ruling out nothing.” https://t.co/Qs7rvEXueM pic.twitter.com/2FBNS7I0DK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 白宫周日抨击国会共和党人在政府拨款法案中加入一项条款，该条款实质上阻止了美国大使馆上空悬挂 LGBTQ+ 自豪旗帜，并誓言要废除该条款。

item.title: 罗马尼亚一家法院驳回了网络红人安德鲁-泰特（Andrew Tate）要求归还在案件调查期间被扣押资产的请求，他在该案中被控贩卖人口、强奸和组成犯罪团伙对妇女进行性剥削。
item.description:
A Romanian court denied a request by online influencer Andrew Tate to return assets that were seized during investigations into the case in which he is charged with human trafficking, rape and forming a criminal gang to sexually exploit women. https://t.co/okHy0CKWX9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 最近，一种被称为 "鲸龙 "的重甲古鳄鱼祖先物种的化石被鉴定出来，让我们得以一窥 2.15 亿年前的世界。
item.description:
The recent identification of fossils from a heavily armored ancient crocodile ancestor species, known as aetosaurs, provides a glimpse into our world 215 million years ago. https://t.co/s7wXRmao85

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 一个外科小组说，他们进行了世界上首次将经过基因编辑的猪肾移植到活人体内。
item.description:
A surgical team said it has conducted the world's first genetically edited pig kidney transplant into a living human. https://t.co/VWVDTF8W8p

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 最近，一种被称为 "鲸龙 "的重甲古鳄鱼祖先物种的化石被鉴定出来，让我们得以一窥 2.15 亿年前的世界。
item.description:
The recent identification of fossils from a heavily armored ancient crocodile ancestor species, known as aetosaurs, provides a glimpse into our world 215 million years ago. https://t.co/kT2LAiYz4s

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在佛罗里达州布雷沃德县，一只名叫 "齐柏林 "的警犬决定从印第安河上的一座高桥上跳下，一名反应迅速的警长副手救下了她的警犬搭档。
item.description:
A fast-acting sheriff's deputy rescued her K-9 partner after the dog, named "Zeppelin," decided to leap off a bridge high above the Indian River in Brevard County, Florida.

Authorities say the incident occurred as the deputy returned to her vehicle after a felony arrest. pic.twitter.com/3Kw67odbcP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在以色列上周对加沙的希法医院发动袭击之后，一场激烈的战斗仍在继续。以色列称已在医院逮捕了数百名武装分子，目击袭击的巴勒斯坦目击者描述了医院内令人震惊的场景。@mattgutmanABC报道。
item.description:
An intense battle continues at the Al-Shifa hospital in Gaza after Israel launched a raid at the facility last week. Israel says it has arrested hundreds of militants at the hospital, as Palestinian witnesses to the raid describe alarming scenes inside. @mattgutmanABC reports. pic.twitter.com/AGRQ2fFmiE

— World News Tonight (@ABCWorldNews) March 25, 2024

item.title: 研究表明，由于气候变化，北美典型的过敏季节变得更长、更剧烈。
item.description:
Typical allergy seasons are getting longer and more intense in North America because of climate change, research shows. https://t.co/Eb387PW3Gf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 由于以色列继续表示计划向拉法发动地面进攻，援助组织警告说，入侵将是对平民的 "血洗"，并加深加沙地带的人道主义危机。
item.description:
As Israel continues to indicate plans to launch a ground offensive into Rafah, aid organizations warn that an invasion would be a "bloodbath" for civilians and deepen the humanitarian crisis in the Gaza Strip. https://t.co/Um7BbUlKDa

item.title: 根据最新研究，全球气温上升可能对农业和全球通货膨胀造成的压力将可能导致食品价格进一步上涨。
item.description:
The strain that rising global temperatures could have on the agriculture industry and inflation around the world will likely cause food prices to increase even more, according to new research. https://t.co/VyUCs0Wxx0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 参议员马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）在很大程度上为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的起诉豁免权辩护，因为这位前总统正面临数起刑事审判。"我确实认为这里有一个合理的问题，我们需要广泛讨论。
item.description:
Sen. Marco Rubio largely defended Donald Trump's claims of immunity against prosecution as the former president faces several criminal trials.

"I do think there's a legitimate issue here that we need to talk about writ large.” https://t.co/j1ZTkvfvYL pic.twitter.com/l0ufHfAb9e

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 在意大利翁布里亚大区，喜欢刺激的自然爱好者可以鸟瞰田园风光--如果他们有足够的勇气踏上一个新景点--一座悬挂在河谷上方 570 多英尺处的 "西藏 "式桥梁。
item.description:
Thrill-seeking nature lovers in Italy's Umbria region can get a bird's-eye view of the countryside — if they're brave enough to step foot on a new attraction, a "Tibetan"-style bridge suspended more than 570 feet above a river valley. pic.twitter.com/Fyp5hYCQE9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 在南非皮拉尼斯堡国家公园，一头公象与一辆野生动物园卡车发生紧张对峙，受惊的游客纷纷躲到座位之间。
item.description:
Frightened tourists can be seen ducking between seats during a tense standoff between a bull elephant and a safari truck in Pilanesberg National Park, South Africa. https://t.co/lAPrmLopw1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024
